Package project301.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileSystemController
    Save tasks in json files and load tasks from json file
    OfflineController
    Activities can execute offline tasks when the App reconnects to the internet through this controller.
    TaskController
    Activities can communicate with task model, bid model through this class.
    TaskController.addTask
    A static class to add a task to ES database
    TaskController.deleteAllTasks
    A static class to delete all tasks in ES database
    TaskController.deleteTaskById
    A static class to delete a task by its id in ES database
    TaskController.getTaskById
    A static class to get a task by its id from ES database
    TaskController.providerCancelBid
    A static class to cancel a bid in ES database
    TaskController.providerGetBiddenTasks
    A static class to get provider bidden tasks in ES database
    TaskController.providerSetBid
    A static class to set bid in ES database
    TaskController.requesterGetBiddenTasks
    A static class to get requester bidden tasks in ES database
    TaskController.requesterUpdateTask
    A static class to update tasks in ES database
    TaskController.searchAllBid
    A static class to search all bid of a task
    TaskController.searchAllBiddenTasks
    A static class to search all requesting tasks in ES database
    TaskController.searchAllRequestingTasks
    A static class to search all requesting tasks in ES database
    TaskController.searchAllTasksOfThisRequester
    A static class to search all tasks of this requester in ES database
    TaskController.searchAssignTasksOfThisProvider
    A static class to search all tasks of this provider in ES database
    TaskController.searchBiddenTasksOfThisProvider
    A static class to search bidden tasks in ES database
    TaskController.searchTaskByKeyword
    A static class to search task by key word in ES database
    TaskController.yuqi8delete
    For development, will delete finally
    UserListController
    Activities can communicate with user model through this class.
    UserListController.addUser
    A static class used to add user to the ES database
    UserListController.deleteAllUsers
    A static class used to delete all user from the ES database
    UserListController.GetAllUsers
    A static class used to get all user to the ES database
    UserListController.getAUserById
    A static class used to get a user by its Id from the ES database
    UserListController.getAUserByName
    A static class used to get a user by its name from the ES database
    UserListController.updateUser
    Static class that update user profile
